description: To have dinner on the table in just 30 minutes, try this one-pot chicken pesto pasta recipe. The addition of peas and zucchini means extra veg at dinner time.
name: One-pot Creamy Chicken Pesto Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add cream, chicken mixture and peas to pan and cook for 1 minute or until heated through. Season. Stir in pesto. Serve pasta topped with reserved basil.
